attributes.action: Express love from the UK to European friends and apologise for deep hurt caused.
attributes.background: In order to show that the appalling hurt caused to people within the UK, across Europe and indeed the entire world, by some politicians and individuals, is not the wish of the vast majority of UK citizens who love our European and international friends.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
